thread.title: Kannada actor Shivarajkumar suffers heart attack
thread.title_full: Kannada actor Shivarajkumar suffers heart attack - The Times of India

author: Manu Aiyappa
title: Kannada actor Shivarajkumar suffers heart attack
text:
Kannada actor Shivaraj Kumar, son of late matinee idol Dr Rajkumar has been hospitalised after he complained of a severe chest pain while working out at a gym on Tuesday. 

According to sources , the man had a history of high blood pressure and had a stressful job - factors that may have contributed to mild heart attack. 

The gym staff immediately shifted the actor hospital where he subjected to ECG and Angiogram. 

Hospital sources said they have found two blocks in the artery and doctors are yet to decide on whether they need to conduct angioplasty or an open heart surgery.
